
需要在application-dev.properties里面增加以下参数

#存放路径,以;分割
file.path=/home/hadoop/file/temp/;

#记录文件删除保留天数最小30,默认90,-1为各自项目自动调用删除
file.delete.record.retainDay=-1

#文件系统均匀上传,false:一个用完才用下一个
file.write.cycle=false

#filesysadmin
file.admin.accout=2e1302394ad0ab1a20a6c16231cd691b
#filesysadmin
file.admin.password=9bc5bea75eefb22a7c2746b1bc0864d93347d307c9f7f4a44e4dd13f0a337e689b8619251a19057cff70779273e95aa6577\
  bcc914f9e55d5e4e4f82f9f00e7d48fc4c7ab4453d247e011738197b6136c555d6702c950ecb729a966504af0a63528f0b864598a1291557bed24\
  8a998d4e71c32595c397960f74555a8b9db16f7533a97012cdc6b7767cf71404ac21cf25b5b4094c70811825d4594e6a5a227e4977880d29bd323\
  c06214b51e43515399a0aa69098421afb3fed2179a9ac2f39de68b6a776378decbb4a79cda89087c4ce6b15c1729c4511b1f3625befaabe4c78ac\
  18ecedc6a1a71b26568c53ae5c0e62550748639a1675e04db3d8a4135094a00965d2bfac11dbee3d4b3002d525ddcc6a2408ed8723d43f8ae3ea6\
  5c1a6f664a327324a527bd34ea0f13d4e212a58089bc493b10a92d947b412e2c50915cba9e77aa1b8a24da9674c86f83bb588777b82aa4b0af34c\
  2313a562076992e50aa3a733fa9b25f33689e2adbe72199f0e629b04d152845ec0a378394003c96da594ffbb466329361588defb5e30e5df168f0\
  0ca830b216a4a8bfa1a285922b8100146e7d8a9218ab3c3b572492c82786d28f7ba755c736f384e67833dfd65ecba3110a5ab2db37feedfdeaab1\
  92ead4ac0e0e28f8bd8d065cdef5cf35b1dc5027ac60a50ef4585f3ca440af4fc5b6497e2c30eaaaf5c36ec455827f2ad34b41f70d
